name: UPSHIFT
description:
audio doesn't work in chrome anymore because they messed up web audio. i'm not sure how to fix it. i recommend you play with firefox

we made a game for ludum dare jam 35

programmed by jenn kaplan and jessica hayley

composed by lena raine

logo by erica lahaie

instructions:

arrow keys to move, you gotta hit them on the beat!

get to the green goal! u gotta be the same shape as the barriers to pass through

if yr having trouble, refresh the page
